timeline.bodyText:
SDK_INT is never < 21. Please change to
  return NO_STATUS;
see https://ci.cgeo.org/view/Continous%20integration/job/cgeo%20continuous%20integration/3047/androidLintResult/type.398387310/
or add @SuppressLint(" ObsoleteSdkInt") if it should stay as template.
timeline.author: bekuno

replies.bodyText: The latter, so I'll add a @SuppressLint
replies.author: moving-bits
